mesa:header.mesa:title: Scheduled Station AE Title (0040,0001) and Scheduled Station Name (0040,0010)
mesa:header.mesa:description: In the table: 1. The Scheduled Station AE Title and Scheduled Station Name have the same value. This is by design. 2. All names use underscore (_) as a separator. The table may make it look like the separators are space characters.
